ContactId.title: ContactId
ContactId.description: Contact Id associated a contact in sf

Message.title: Message
Message.description: Brief result text (e.g., ‘Matched existing contact by email’ or ‘Contact created’). If an error occurred, this includes a concise error message.

WasExisting.title: WasExisting
WasExisting.description: true if an existing Contact was found by Email; otherwise false
